Class UiUtils

java.lang.Object
Launcher.UiUtils
public final class UiUtils extends Object
Utility helpers for building and formatting common Swing UI elements used by the simulator dashboard.

All methods are static convenience helpers for consistent styling and for formatting statistics data into human-readable strings.

  • Method Details

    • makeButton

      public static JButton makeButton(String text)
      Create a standardized button used throughout the UI.
      Parameters:
      text - button label text
      Returns:
      a styled `JButton` instance

    • makeTextArea

      public static JTextArea makeTextArea(int rows, int cols, Font font, boolean lineWrap, boolean editable)
      Create a configured `JTextArea`.
      Parameters:
      rows - number of rows for the text area
      cols - number of columns for the text area
      font - optional font to apply (null to keep default)
      lineWrap - whether to enable line wrapping
      editable - whether the text area should be editable
      Returns:
      a configured `JTextArea` instance

    • wrapInScroll

      public static JScrollPane wrapInScroll(Component comp, int vPolicy, int hPolicy)
      Wrap a component in a `JScrollPane` with the provided scrollbar policies.
      Parameters:
      comp - component to wrap
      vPolicy - vertical scrollbar policy (e.g. `ScrollPaneConstants.VERTICAL_SCROLLBAR_AS_NEEDED`)
      hPolicy - horizontal scrollbar policy
      Returns:
      a `JScrollPane` containing the component

    • addLabelWithGap

      public static void addLabelWithGap(JPanel parent, JLabel label, int gap)
      Add a label to a panel followed by a vertical gap.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent panel to receive the label and gap
      label - the label to add
      gap - vertical gap in pixels to insert after the label

    • createStatSection

      public static JPanel createStatSection(String title)
      Create a small vertical section panel used to display a titled statistics block.
      Parameters:
      title - the title text to display at the top of the section
      Returns:
      a configured `JPanel` prepared for stat components

    • setLabelText

      public static void setLabelText(JLabel lbl, String text)
      Safely set text on a label if it is non-null.
      Parameters:
      lbl - label to update (may be null)
      text - text to set

    • segoeFont

      public static Font segoeFont(int style, int size)
      Convenience factory for the Segoe UI font used in the UI.
      Parameters:
      style - font style (e.g. `Font.PLAIN`, `Font.BOLD`)
      size - font size in points
      Returns:
      a new `Font` instance

    • showQueueStatsDialog

      public static void showQueueStatsDialog(Component parent, RoadEnum road, int current, int max, double avg, long samples)
      Show a modal dialog containing queue statistics for a road.
      Parameters:
      parent - parent component for the dialog (may be null)
      road - the road being reported
      current - current queue length
      max - maximum observed queue length
      avg - average queue size
      samples - number of samples used to compute the average

    • joinCounts

      public static String joinCounts(Map<VehicleType,Integer> map)
      Render a map of vehicle counts as a compact string in the order of `VehicleType.values()`.
      Parameters:
      map - counts keyed by `VehicleType`
      Returns:
      a single-line string like "CAR=3 BUS=1 BIKE=0"

    • formatAvgWait

      public static String formatAvgWait(Map<VehicleType,Long> avgWaitMs)
      Format average waiting times (milliseconds) as seconds per vehicle type.
      Parameters:
      avgWaitMs - map of vehicle type → average wait in milliseconds
      Returns:
      formatted string like "CAR=1.23 BUS=0.00"

    • formatAvgRoad

      public static String formatAvgRoad(Map<VehicleType,Double> avgRoad)
      Format average road traversal times (or distances) per vehicle type.
      Parameters:
      avgRoad - map of vehicle type → average road value (double)
      Returns:
      formatted string like "CAR=12.34 BUS=15.00"

    • formatTripStats

      public static String formatTripStats(Map<VehicleType,long[]> tripStats)
      Format trip statistics (min/avg/max) given in milliseconds per vehicle type. Each value is converted to seconds and rendered as "min/avg/max".
      Parameters:
      tripStats - map of vehicle type → long[] containing {minMs, avgMs, maxMs}
      Returns:
      formatted string like "CAR=1.00/3.50/10.00 BUS=..."
